\define tv-action-refresh-policy() always \define tiddlerSpacer()
\end \define migrateAssessment() <$list filter="[all[current]get[twsm_assessment_description]]" variable=twsmAssessmentDescription> <$list filter="[all[current]get[text]addsuffixaddsuffix]" variable=newText> <$action-setfield text=<>/> <$action-deletefield twsm_assessment_description/> \end \define migrateMitigation() <$list filter="[all[current]get[twsm_mitigation_description]]" variable=twsmMitigationDescription> <$list filter="[all[current]get[text]addsuffixaddsuffix]" variable=newText> <$action-setfield text=<>/> <$action-deletefield twsm_mitigation_description/> \end \define migrateLikelihood() <$list filter="[all[current]get[twsm_likelihood]]" variable=likelihood> <$list filter="[all[current]twsm_get_at_for_deprecated_state[]]" variable=newAttackTree> <$action-setfield attack_tree=<>/> <$action-deletefield twsm_likelihood/> <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]] -[all[current]tags[]twsm_class[control]] +[addprefixaddsuffixjoin[ ]]" variable=newTags> <$action-listops $field=tags $filter=<>/> <$action-updaterisk/> \end \define processRisk() <> <> <> \end <$edit-text tag=textarea field=twsm_assessment_description/> <$button> Process All Risks <$list filter="[all[]twsm_class[risk]]"> <>
A description of the assessment: * Assessment 1 * Assessment 2 * Assessment 3

title: A sample risk
attack_tree:
* <<branch "Basic attack" AND>>
** <<leaf "Migrated probability from previous risk model version" "Highly Unlikely">>
rendered_attack_tree: * AND · Highly Unlikely Basic attack ** · Highly Unlikely Migrated probability from previous risk model version
draft_attack_tree:
* <<branch "Basic attack" AND>>
** <<leaf "Migrated probability from previous risk model version" "Almost Certain">>
** <<control "A preventative procedural control with bells">>
